item.title: Fibonacci calculators and time complexity
item.description: Simple definitions One common programming exercise assigned to students is to create a Fibonacci sequence calculator. The Fibonacci sequence can be defined as follows: start with the numbers 0 and 1 (some versions may start with 1 and 1). to get the next number in the sequence, add the last two numbers in the sequence. Let’s try it! We start with zero and one according to the first rule.
